reviews.review_text:
Fat fish really lived up to its name and the hype!
Hands down the best food I've had in a really really long time....
After hearing so much about them, we finally decided to pay a visit; and I must say, it was the best decision ever!!!

All the food was fresh. You can choose your fish and be assured, it's cooked to perfection! The blend of flavours and spices are simply impeccable! Leaving you craving for more!

The service was top notch, thanks a ton to our server Akash who made us feel comfortable and at home, making sure each dish was well served, special directions of preparation was followed to the T and overall really courteous.

Thank you Fat Fish for an amazing experience and even better food ...
We will definitely visit for more!!!

As the name implies, Fat Fish caters to all sea food lovers. The restaurant ambience is cozy and laid back. The food was delicious with great presentation. The Fish tikkas, Phomphret fry and Fish curry was amazing. Overall good place to hangout and have great food.

,,⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Review of Fat Fish, Anjuna

Fat Fish is a must-visit restaurant in Anjuna, Goa, especially for seafood lovers. The ambiance is vibrant yet laid-back, with a welcoming vibe that suits Goa’s charm.

The menu offers an impressive range of dishes, with the seafood platter and Goan fish curry being standout choices. The flavors are authentic, showcasing the freshness of the ingredients and the mastery of traditional Goan recipes. If you're not a seafood enthusiast, the variety of vegetarian and non-seafood options won't disappoint either.

The service was prompt, and the staff were friendly, always ready to recommend the best dishes or pairings. The portion sizes were generous, making it great value for money.

Whether you’re visiting for a hearty meal after exploring Anjuna or looking for a spot to unwind with good food and drinks, Fat Fish delivers an unforgettable dining experience.
